sense.def:
To lean in a particular direction
pomeni nagniti telo v določeno smer.

seg.quote: He was sitting on the edge of his chair and leaning eagerly forwards.
I leaned out of the window.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with or without
OBJ,
with
ADJUNCT

sense.def:
To lean on something
pomeni nasloniti se na nekaj, da delno podpira našo težo.
To lean an object on something
pomeni postaviti neki predmet tako, da njegovo težo delno podpira stvar, na katero se naslanja.

seg.quote: He leaned the bike against a railing.

sense.def:
To lean towards a particular idea or action
pomeni odobravati neko idejo ali dejanje in se vesti temu primerno.

cit.quote: nagibati se k čemu, dajati prednost

sense.def:
Kdor je
lean
, je suh, vendar je videti močan in v dobri kondiciji.

Meso, ki je
lean
, ne vsebuje veliko maščobe.

V obdobju, ki je
lean
, ljudje nimajo veliko hrane, denarja ali uspeha.

seg.quote: In the lean years, crop failures are common.

sense.def:
To lean on someone
ali
to lean upon someone
pomeni poskusiti vplivati na nekoga z grožnjami.

seg.quote: They can lean on the administration by threatening to withhold their subscriptions.

sense.def:
To lean on someone
ali
to lean upon someone
pomeni tudi biti odvisen od nekoga za podporo in spodbudo.
